meanings.definition: Not made dim or less bright.
meanings.sent1: The undimmed sun shone brightly in the sky.
meanings.sent2: The stars in the undimmed night sky sparkled beautifully.
meanings.sent3: Even with sunglasses on, his undimmed smile lit up the room.
meanings.sent4: Her undimmed enthusiasm for life was like a beacon in the darkness.
meanings.sent5: The undimmed lighthouse guided ships safely to shore.

meanings.sent1: His undimmed energy kept him going all day long.
meanings.sent2: The undimmed joy of the children playing was contagious.
meanings.sent3: Despite the rain, her undimmed determination to finish the race was admirable.
meanings.sent4: The undimmed hope in his eyes was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: Their undimmed friendship stood the test of time.
